## Read in data

```{r}
lizards <- read_csv("lizard.csv")
```

## Start nonlinear Least Square Model

W = a*SVL^b

- W = weight
- SVL = snout to vent length
- a and b are the parameters needed to be fit

### Wrangle data

```{r}
lizards_log <- lizards %>% 
  mutate(log_length = log(SV_length)) %>% 
  mutate(log_weight = log(weight))

lizards_model <- lm(log_weight ~ log_length, data = lizards_log)
lizards_model

conceptual_model <- function(a, SVL, b) {

}
```
